name: Reversible Baby Shoes, Alligators
description:
These soft-sole baby shoes will be perfect for your little girl or they make a great, unique gift for someone special. Handmade from 100% cotton and linen, these shoes will be so soft on your baby's feet. An elastic back will keep this shoe securely on.

These shoes are made with a cute Japanese import pink and white alligator print, and reverses to a red and pink polka dot. 

There are no exposed seams on any of my shoes. I take extra care in offering you a pair of shoes that your baby can wear until they will fit no longer. Closed seams also offers a more comfy fit for your child.

Baby shoes in size 6-12, 12-18 & 18-24 months are made with a suede sole.
These shoes may be machine washed and dried. Baby shoes are made to order. Please see my shop policies for current production time on all made to order items.

Baby Shoes are available in:
Size 1 : 0-3 months, sole is 3.75" (9.5cm) 
Size 2 : 3-6 months, sole is 4.25" (10.8cm) 
Size 3 : 6-12 months, sole is 4.75" (11.4cm) 
Size 4 : 12-18 months, sole is 5.5" (14cm)
Size 5: 18-24 months, sole is 6" (15.2cm)

name: Reversible Baby Shoes, PDF Pattern
description:
*Reversible Baby Shoes PDF pattern.

*You may sell the finished product from this pattern.

These soft-sole baby shoes will be perfect for your little one or they make a great, unique gift for someone special.

There are no exposed seams on my shoes, making them fully reversible. Closed seams also offers a more comfy fit for your child.

My original pattern includes:
8 pages of clear step by step instructions,
21 color photos to help guide you,
Tips to help you with each step,
complete sewing instructions

Sizes included are: 
0-3 months,
3-6 months,
6-12 months,
12-18 months.

Pattern will be email to you within 24 hours. Please make sure the email adress in your paypal information is correct, otherwise please note your email address during checkout.

You MAY sell the finished product of these baby shoes by including 'This pattern was designed by weepereas' in your listing, as well as linking to my shop.When selling the product offline, please write this on the tag.

Due to the nature of this listing, there are no returns. All rights reserved Weepereas. Finished product may only be made by crafters, and may not be mass produced.
